explains: vt. 免除；赦免；宣告……无罪

sentences.en: I absolve you from all your sins.
A desperate honesty that throbs through his confession does not absolve him from sins of diabolical cunning. He is abnormal.
sentences.cn: 他的忏悔被绝望的虔诚悸动着，并也不能免除他那恶魔的狡诈。他是不正常的。

sentences.en: This cannot absolve you from all responsibility.
sentences.cn: 这并不能解除你的全部责任。
